Text: Everything works superbly, no language issues or install. Crack is included in the setup process without having to copy and paste anything. It runs without origin. However, there is no limited edition content in the safe.

Works perfectly whe installed.
If you get errors installing directX, just go to C:windows/sysWOW64/directx enable the view of hidden items and then you'll see a folder named websetup. Erase all of its contents and restart the installation. This should do it.
Thank you!
